Your password must be at least 8 letters
We recommend you review your info and add extra login protection to your account. Accurate info will help us connect if there's ever a security issue with your account.
Is this still your email? Make sure your contact details are correct to help easily resset your passworkd, get notifications, and find friends.\nUpdate your email if needed.
Is this still your mobile number? Make sure your contact details are correct to help easily resset your passworkd, get notifications, and find friends.\nUpdate your mobile number if needed.

When reporting an issue, essential details about your device, account, and the app are automatically included in the report to aid in understanding and resolving the problem.

To expedite the resolution, you can assist by sending comprehensive logs and diagnostics, including user activity logs, network logs, crash logs, and memory dumps associated with WeConnect.

Rest assured, the information in this report will only be used to address the reported issue and will not be used for other purposes.
